verses.verse: Now <S%H6258><s%> gather thyself in <S%H1413>troops,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1416>troops:<s%> he hath <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us: they shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8199>judge<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3895>cheek.<s%>

But <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> <S%H672>Ephratah,<s%> though thou <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6810>little<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> yet out <S%H4480>of<s%> thee shall he come <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto me that is to <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> whose goings <S%H4163>forth<s%> have been from of <S%H4480>old,<s%> <S%H6924><s%> from <S%H4480>everlasting.<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> will he give them <S%H5414>up,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> that she which <S%H3205>travaileth<s%> hath brought <S%H3205>forth:<s%> then the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of his <S%H251>brethren<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> in the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God;<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>abide:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall he be <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> man shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into our <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> he shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> in our <S%H759>palaces,<s%> then shall we <S%H6965>raise<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5257>principal<s%> <S%H120>men.<s%>

And they shall <S%H7489>waste<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrances<s%> thereof: thus shall he <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H935>cometh<s%> into our <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H1869>treadeth<s%> within our <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as a <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as the <S%H7241>showers<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6212>grass,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6960>tarrieth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> for <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3176>waiteth<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> as a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> among the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> <S%H834>who,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he go <S%H5674>through,<s%> both treadeth <S%H7429>down,<s%> and teareth in <S%H2963>pieces,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> can <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>
Thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> thy <S%H5483>horses<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee, and I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> thy chariots: <S%H4818><s%>
And I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of thy <S%H776>land,<s%> and throw <S%H2040>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy strongholds: <S%H4013><s%>
And I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%> out of thine <S%H4480>hand;<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and thou shalt <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more soothsayers: <S%H6049><s%>

Thy graven <S%H6456>images<s%> also will I cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> and thy standing <S%H4676>images<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee; and thou shalt <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
And I will pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> thy <S%H842>groves<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee: so will I <S%H8045>destroy<s%> thy <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H853>upon<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
